channel.title: Force Yell Help
channel.description: hello guys. i am trying to figure out how to forceyell when someone does something. like when a trusted dicer, dices. instead of a friend chat how can i just make just yell? please help me it will help alot. Or if someone type's in a command. ;D

item.title: Force Yell Help
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:15, topic:449948”]whereever you handle dicing:

for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (PlayerHandler.players[i] != null) { Client c2 = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("message"); } }[/quote]
thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Force Yell Help
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

whereever you handle dicing:

for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (PlayerHandler.players[i] != null) { Client c2 = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("message"); } }

item.title: Force Yell Help
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Public Static String MessageToAll = "";
messageToAll = players[i].playerName+" has rolled a whatever on the dice +";

Read full topic

item.title: Force Yell Help
item.dc:creator: @DarkSuch DarkSuch
item.description:
@DarkSuch wrote:

[quote=“DevinCooley, post:9, topic:449948”]o then just put ::yell in the beginning of the c2.sendmessage chat.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("dice") && c.playerRights >= 3) { c.gfx0(2075); c.startAnimation(11900); int random = Misc.random(100); c.forcedChat("::yell [" + c.properName + "] has rolled a " + random + " on the percentile dice"); c.sendMessage("You just rolled " + random);//chat Method, clan chat etc }

just code that into your commands ^^ and it will work perfect[/quote]
Doesnt work… just puts ::yell at the beginning of the sentence. doesnt actually yell it.

Read full topic

item.title: Force Yell Help
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

DarkSuch:

guys you are spot on. but like it doesnt yell it. it just forcechats it. i want it to broadcast all over the server. so anyone anywhere can read it.

Using c2.sendMessage will send a chat message to ALL other clients.

Read full topic

item.title: Force Yell Help
item.dc:creator: @DarkSuch DarkSuch
item.description:
@DarkSuch wrote:

#team_rocket i want to yell it.
so far it looks like.

[code=java]if(playerCommand.startsWith(“dice”) && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“frost”))) {

		c.gfx0(2075);
                    c.startAnimation(11900);
                    int random = Misc.random(100);
                    c.forcedChat("<shad=0>[<shad=16711680>" + c.properName + "<shad=0>]<shad=12595455> has rolled " + random + " 
                    using a Percentile Dice.");
                    c.sendMessage("<shad=12595455>You just rolled " + random);//chat Method, clan chat etc
                    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Force Yell Help
item.dc:creator: @DevinCooley DevinCooley
item.description:
@DevinCooley wrote:

o then just put ::yell in the beginning of the c2.sendmessage chat.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("dice") && c.playerRights >= 3) { c.gfx0(2075); c.startAnimation(11900); int random = Misc.random(100); c.forcedChat("::yell [" + c.properName + "] has rolled a " + random + " on the percentile dice"); c.sendMessage("You just rolled " + random);//chat Method, clan chat etc }

just code that into your commands ^^ and it will work perfect

Read full topic

item.title: Force Yell Help
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("dice")) { c.gfx0(2075); c.startAnimation(11900); int random = Misc.random(100); c.sendMessage("You just rolled " + random);//chat Method, clan chat etc c2.sendMessage("[" + c.properName + "] has rolled a " + random + " on the percentile dice"); }
So like that? :3
Creds to Devin xD

Read full topic

item.title: Force Yell Help
item.dc:creator: @DarkSuch DarkSuch
item.description:
@DarkSuch wrote:

Exactly Like that. But That Is Not A Yell. Like I Want It To Broadcast To everyone Not Just The People Around The Person Dicing.

Read full topic

item.title: Force Yell Help
item.dc:creator: @DevinCooley DevinCooley
item.description:
@DevinCooley wrote:

go into commands.java and code this.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("dice")) { c.gfx0(2075); c.startAnimation(11900); int random = Misc.random(100); c.forcedChat("[" + c.properName + "] has rolled a " + random + " on the percentile dice"); c.sendMessage("You just rolled " + random);//chat Method, clan chat etc }

Read full topic

getUpdateFlags().setForceChatMessage("Stand and deliver!");
